column4: hello I have asus p5b mainboard and I cant install ubuntu. is there any fixed .iso for us ?
do you get the bootable CD menu?
I am opening with bootable cd to install but when desktop comes I cant understand anything
the install CD desktop or the installed system desktop?
I have a ubuntu 6.10 CD DEsktop cd
yes but maybe the problem with my ATI CARD
if you can, try 7.04, it has better support for new motherboards
when you boot, you can switch resolution (F4) iirc, try to set different resolutions if you can't see the desktop
I'm sure someoneelse will be around to assist though
I cant see 64Bit CD for intel
for 64 bit intel you use AMD64 too
however, it will reqire more work to ge AMD64 wokring good
if this is your first time, I recomend you to start with i386
